options.label: tbl-table0001
options.tbl-cap: Snapshot of the five first rows of the '<tt>tecator</tt>' dataset. Note that the column labelled as '<tt>absorbance</tt>' is composed of '<tt>tfd</tt>' objects, from the '<tt>tidyfun</tt>' <tt>R</tt> package.

options.label: fig-figures0001
options.fig.cap: Left panel: sample estimated density of the fat percentage. Right panel: sample boxplot of the fat percentage.

options.label: tbl-table0002
options.tbl-cap: Sample summary statistics of the fat percentage.

options.label: fig-figures0002
options.fig.cap: Left panel: spaghetti plot of the absorbance curves, separated by fat percentage. Right panel: mean absorbance curves, separated by fat percentage.

options.label: fig-figures0003
options.fig.cap: Left panel: absorbance variance curves, separated by fat percentage. Right panel: correlogram of the absorbance curves.

options.label: tbl-table0003
options.tbl-cap: Comparisons of the '<tt>absorbance</tt>' and '<tt>dabsorbance</tt>' columns of the five first rows of the '<tt>tecator</tt>' dataset. The column labelled as '<tt>dabsorbance</tt>' is composed of '<tt>tfd</tt>' objects, and represents the first order derivative of the '<tt>absorbance</tt>' column, as computed via finite differences.

options.label: fig-figures0004
options.fig.cap: Left panel: spaghetti plot of the derivative of the absorbance curves, separated by fat percentage. Right panel: mean derivative of the absorbance curves, separated by fat percentage.

options.label: fig-figures0005
options.fig.cap: Left panel: variance of the derivative of the absorbance curves, separated by fat percentage. Right panel: correlogram of the derivative of the absorbance curves.

options.label: fig-figures0006
options.fig.cap: Upper panel: functional boxplots of the absorbance curves. Lower panel: functional boxplots of the derivative of the absorbance curves.

options.label: fig-figures0007
options.fig.cap: Upper panel: spaghetti plot of the absorbance curves, separated by fat percentage, with outlier curves highlighted in black; observation $140$ is likewise dashed. Lower panel: spaghetti plot of the derivative of the absorbance curves, separated by fat percentage, with outlier curves highlighted in black.

options.label: fig-figures0008
options.fig.cap: Upper panel: mean and median absorbance curves, separated by fat percentage, represented respectively by solid and dashed curves. Lower panel: mean and median derivative of the absorbance curves, separated by fat percentage, represented respectively by solid and dashed curves.

options.label: fig-figures0009
options.fig.cap: Left panel: raw absorbance curves. Right panel: smoothed absorbance curves.

options.label: fig-figures0010
options.fig.cap: Left panel: raw derivative of the absorbance curves. Right panel: smoothed derivative of the absorbance curves.

options.label: fig-figures0011
options.fig.cap: Left panel: smoothed absorbance curves on the training set. Right panel: smoothed absorbance curves on the test set.
